## 1.1
```
9 -> 0x9
136 -> 0x88
247 -> 0xE7
```

## 1.2
16^6 = 16777216

## 1.3 
34 characters

```
6 0110
8 1000
6 0110
5 0101
6 0110
c 1101
6 0110
c 1101
6 0110
f 1111

->

01101000 01100101 01101101 01101101 01101111
```

## 2.1
```
4 -> 0b100
65 -> 0b1000001
105 -> 0b1101001
255 -> 0b111111111
```
```
10 -> 2
11 -> 3
1101100 -> 108
1010101 -> 85
```

## 2.2
```
11111111  carry
 11111111
 00001101
100001100
```

Sum is 0b100001100 with 9 bits. Sum is 0b00001100 with 8 bits and overflow.

## 2.3
